setting.name: *addFpsToScoreboard
setting.desc: Add current FPS to scoreboard. This setting will only have an effect when this or the scoreboard resource is restarted.

setting.desc: Add average FPS to scoreboard. This setting will only have an effect when this or the scoreboard resource is restarted.
